@Metroid 2.00 I just enjoy thinking up scenarios where the guy THINKS  after getting the evidence that something is wrong and goes about fixing things, like  leaving her ass , seeing a lawyer  with his evidence, getting a paternity test, kicking her ass out with  the kid. 

Yeah,  NTRs make everyone stupid as fuck, but I like to think of an ending that would get revenge on everyone. We do not have nearly enough of those type.

For those who were wondering why he thought he was the dad at the start, check end of last chapter. 

After waking up from a blackout drunk half-naked, girl is lying naked next to him buck-naked with a full tank. You'd make assumptions.

He has the fucking evidence right in front of him! When she says she is pregnant, he should say, 'I know. Which fucker was it?' and point to that screen. Then send it to his parents, her parents, to a Reddit type post,  save it somewhere with the company's info that did this shit to give to the police or something.  Then....pay them a little visit to know your 'displeasure.' Oh, and get paternity tests for the divorce proceedings.  I mean she cannot deny it now.

This is a strange ending for Carn since the mc hasn't been branded a cuck or mindbroken. Usually it's a given that the mc will stay cuz he's lowkey in on it but this time it ends with him just finding out.
